title: FIBA EuroChallenge Final Four MVP
text: The FIBA EuroChallenge Final Four MVP, or FIBA EuroChallenge Finals MVP, was the <a href="most%20valuable%20player">most valuable player</a> award that was presented to the <a href="basketball">basketball</a> player who most exhibited exceptional play during the <a href="FIBA%20EuroChallenge">FIBA EuroChallenge</a>'s <a href="Final%20Four">Final Four</a> stage, which was the final stage of Europe's former <a href="European%20professional%20club%20basketball%20system">third-tier level</a> European-wide <a href="professional%20sports">professional</a> <a href="sports%20club">club</a> basketball tournament.
